title: This account has been permanently suspended.
body:
I don't know what happened on my account. i have no idea that what i done before in the game, but i'm pretty sure that i didn't be rude in the game or thing like AFK .
i  remember my last game is on 7 of July, but today  when i was trying to login, it shows me "This account has been permanently suspended." I was like what is that !!! So people, can u help me out of this ？please～
HEXTECH chests!!
May be, i'm saying maybe because i have't been charged for a long time.
_JUST MAYBE._
HELP PLEASE `~~~~~~~{{champion:104}}

replies.body:
yeah someone elo boosted your acc and you either got caught elo boosting or your booster used scripts
this is evident through the change in flash keys (D and F) and the wins/losses with those flash bindings prove this
http://puu.sh/qbFJC/1f3607816e.jpg
look how many times your flash key changes
http://puu.sh/qbFPs/96a3096a0a.jpg
do you share that account with someone?

Sorry,Are you the staff ?  If yes ,well some people will play game in different way, different champion use different way, a comfortable way to play. And I think taht could not be the reason to banned my account . And change in D/F it doesn't mean anything to a sliver player,and I have been played this game for three years , it is my best friend ever ! But now the project skins is coming up ,and I can't collect all at the moment. If you read this message let me know please.

> [{quoted}](name=Brenden,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=lUR2PlEX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-23T14:39:11.978+0000)
>
> yeah someone elo boosted your acc and you either got caught elo boosting or your booster used scripts
> this is evident through the change in flash keys (D and F) and the wins/losses with those flash bindings prove this
> http://puu.sh/qbFJC/1f3607816e.jpg
> look how many times your flash key changes
> http://puu.sh/qbFPs/96a3096a0a.jpg
> do you share that account with someone?

Dear officer:

I'm sorry for I forgot to answer your questions.
I didn't share my accounts with any others.
Like you said , my flash was change in D/F,and now I pretty sure that we have some mistake on it. Now I see the problem, if you have read my history matcha you might find out the date is different , i was busy on my study, but the date shows me I'm still in the game, which mean some one knows my account, but have to said I didn't tell any one my account. People will not read the history match when they login to the game,they read the store pages first. So I have no idea for that as well. Cause change in D/F to me some time is like I'm play riven D is flash and F is tp . So that is the issues. What else can I do to fix this. I mean can u please help me out? Or Anything I need to work with you to unlock my account ? If you read this let me know please.

Regard

Dear officer:

I'm sorry for I forgot to answer your questions.
I didn't share my accounts with any others.
Like you said , my flash was change in D/F,and now I pretty sure that we have some mistake on it.  Now I see the problem, if you have read my history matcha you might find out the date is different , i was busy on my study, but the date shows me I'm still  in the game, which mean some one knows my account, but have to said I didn't tell any one my account.  People will not read the history match when they login to the game,they read the store pages first. So I have no idea for that as well. Cause change in D/F to me some time is like I'm play riven D is flash and F is tp .  So that is the issues. What else can I do to fix this. I mean can  u please help me out? Or Anything I need to work with you to unlock my account ? If you read this let me know please.

Regard

> [{quoted}](name=Brenden,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=lUR2PlEX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-23T14:39:11.978+0000)
>
> yeah someone elo boosted your acc and you either got caught elo boosting or your booster used scripts
> this is evident through the change in flash keys (D and F) and the wins/losses with those flash bindings prove this
> http://puu.sh/qbFJC/1f3607816e.jpg
> look how many times your flash key changes
> http://puu.sh/qbFPs/96a3096a0a.jpg
> do you share that account with someone?

Whoever boosting that account is literal garbage. I'm gonna be honest, though, I sometimes swap flash to 'D' from 'F" if I'm playing certain champs or if I'm using a different keyboard. It doesn't signal boosting.
Sigh. Everybody is a fuckin' victim.
Send a support ticket to riot and do not send more than 1 as they are probably really busy with alot of different cases

Ok thanks .
Do they need any information from me?
Or just tell them my account was banned and needs help.
Just tell them your story and that you just want a 2nd chance. Unfortunately, it will be very less likely that they would give you your account back but hey, always worth a shot.
